name: NightWare MiniJam78
description:
Nightware

If you are a developer, I'm sure that you encountered, at least onc, a bug or an error in your console. This game is about your pain. You no longer are the developer but you are now the evil console that wants to stop the developer from finishing his program.

Thanks to your "Actions" you'll be able to block thes "Functions" of the developer.But be careful, we all know that developers have tools to find and remove bugs.

 I'm Iziram and this is NightWare (a pun between Nightmare and Malware).

I wanted to make a game based on a painful experience that every developer pass by : Debuging.

The theme was "Bugs" and the limitation was "You're the bad guy". The main goal of the game is to generate a maximum of bugs to slow down the Developer. There are 2 differents gamemodes: Speed run and Survival. Speerun has a limited time where Survival has not.

By the way I am french so don't mind my poor english.
